92.eng-name: Afflictions and the End of the World

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "If Allah sends punishment upon a nation then it befalls upon the whole population indiscriminately and then they will be resurrected (and judged) according to their deeds

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا أَنْزَلَ اللَّهُ بِقَوْمٍ عَذَابًا
chapter.eng-name: If Allah sends a punishment upon a nation
